item.title: Karaoke
item.description: A Karaoke night This is part of my Challenge to make 26 things before 2017 ends. Me, my wife and close friends went to the Almodobar’s karaoke bar in Barcelona - best night ever. We arrived at 23:30, which was great as the place was empty and we got the microphones to ourselves for almost an hour, enough to warm up and drink up (with the mandatory tequila/whiskey starter shot).
